page.title: 20Coin Collecting in Calne.
page.content: My name is Robin Parsons.I have 147 British and Foreign coins and three bank notes. I have a 1000 Forint note from Hungary,a 250 mil note from Cyprus,and a 100 dinar note from Yugoslavia. One unusual coin is a square one from India.The biggest coin I have comes from Canada.I have a Barbados dollar,it is the shape of a British fifty pence piece.The oldest coin in my collection is a French one,it was minted in 1854. I have some coins from the Falkland Islands.A British Petty Officer brought them for me.He was serving on H.M.S.Invincible during the Falklands war,between Britain and Argentina, 1982. The information on the last 20 pages was researched by staff and children of Dunstan Junior School,Calne,Wilts.
